scripts.test:all: yarn test:e2e && yarn test # This is useful in this order for ci as e2e will install all dependencies needed for front & back tests
scripts.test:e2e: docker-compose -p test-e2e -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm e2e; exitcode=$?; docker-compose -p test-e2e -f docker-compose.test.yml down; exit ${exitcode}
scripts.test:front: docker-compose -p test-front -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm front yarn test
scripts.test:front:snapshots: docker-compose -p test-front -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm front yarn test -- -u
scripts.test:back: docker-compose -p test-back -f docker-compose.test.yml run -e NODE_CONFIG='{"bypassDeclarationDispatch": false, "bypassDocumentsDispatch": false}' --rm  node yarn test; exitcode=$?; docker-compose -p test-back -f docker-compose.test.yml stop db; docker-compose -p test-back -f docker-compose.test.yml rm -f; exit ${exitcode}
scripts.test:back:snapshots: docker-compose -p test-back -f docker-compose.test.yml run -e NODE_CONFIG='{"bypassDeclarationDispatch": false, "bypassDocumentsDispatch": false}' --rm node yarn test -- -u; exitcode=$?; docker-compose -p test-back -f docker-compose.test.yml stop db; docker-compose -p test-back -f docker-compose.test.yml rm -f; exit ${exitcode}
scripts.database:knex-migrate: docker exec $(docker ps -aq --filter='name=zen_node') yarn run knex migrate:latest
scripts.database:knex-rollback: docker exec $(docker ps -aq --filter='name=zen_node') yarn run knex migrate:rollback
